member.name: IXMLElementCollection.get_length
member.summary: Retrieves the number of elements in the collection.
member.param: The number of elements in the collection.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXMLElementCollection.item
member.summary: Retrieves the child elements from a collection using their index, name, or both.
member.param: A valid index numeric value (within the length of ) or the name of an element in the XML hierarchy.
A valid index numeric value (within the length of ) or the name of an element in the XML hierarchy.
member.returns: Returns an IDispatch pointer to an addressable memory location where the collection is retrievable.

member.name: IXMLElementCollection
member.summary: The IXMLElementCollection interface supports collection of XML elements for indexed access.
